name: Space Sponge Cleanup Crew
description: Oh no! It looks like there has been a huge green glob spill in the nearby asteroid belt! It's a good thing you are a member of the Space Sponge Cleanup Crew! With your porous body, you can easily absorb all of the toxic fluid and safely dispose of it. Absorb as much green glob as you can before your shift ends and earn your respect from your fellow workers, as well as the whole galaxy! But be careful, the asteroid belt can get pretty hectic...
